definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Some rocks from volcanoes break down to form black sand.
sentences.chinese: 有些火山岩被撞碎后会形成黑色的沙。

sentences.english: Volcanic rock can become favorable oil-gas reservoirs .
sentences.chinese: 火山岩可以成为良好的油气储层。

sentences.english: The volcanics in the Beishan area, consisting mainly of lava and tuff, are well developed and linearly distributed.
sentences.chinese: 北山地区火山岩发育，以熔岩和凝灰岩为主。

sentences.english: The Carboniferous volcanic rocks originated from partial melting of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 石炭纪火山岩为部分熔融作用的产物。

sentences.english: The ore-bearing volcanic rock series formed in initial stage of continental rifting.
sentences.chinese: 台矿火山岩系产于大陆裂谷作用的初期阶段。

sentences.english: King George Island consists mainly of Tertiary volcanics which contain plentiful plagioclases.
sentences.chinese: 乔治王岛第三纪火山岩含大量斜长石斑晶。

sentences.english: This is the first ore deposit of such type found in volcanic rocks of the Xiong'er Group in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 这是在河南熊耳群火山岩中首次发现的该类矿床类型。

sentences.english: Marine volcanics of Early Ordovician was found in Zhifang region.
sentences.chinese: 纸房地区具有早奥陶世海相火山岩存在。

sentences.english: Kailu Basin is a volcanic rock basin of continental facies.
sentences.chinese: 开鲁盆地为陆相火山岩盆地。

sentences.english: Volcanic rocks from inside the field were found to be non-magnetic.
sentences.chinese: 在地表内的火山岩被发现是非磁性的。

sentences.english: The characteristics of these volcanic rocks suggest that they were produced in post-collisional period.
sentences.chinese: 综合分析表明，这些火山岩形成于后碰撞期。

sentences.english: The deposit belongs to low-to-moderate hydrothermal type, and bears relationship with subvolcanic rock.
sentences.chinese: 该矿床属于与次火山岩有关的中低温热液矿床。

sentences.english: The stratigraphic contact shows that the Baidafan Formation is volcanic rocks of Early Cretaceous age.
sentences.chinese: 地层接触关系表明白大畈组为早白垩世火山岩。

sentences.english: With strong volcanic activity the south belt extends discontinuously for over one thousand km.
sentences.chinese: 从火山岩的空间分布情况来看，可分为南北两带。

sentences.english: Lava could account for the mare infill on the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 火山岩能解释月球表面大片的阴暗区的形成。

sentences.english: Its petrochemical characteristics show that the volcanics was formed in oceanic island tectonic environment.
sentences.chinese: 岩石化学特征表明火山岩形成于洋岛构造环境。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
